lead_paragraph: Bangladesh captain Mushfiqur Rahim won the toss and opted to bat in the second and final test against England at the Shere Bangla National Stadium on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Bangladesh Win Toss and Bat Against England
headline.main: Bangladesh Win Toss and Bat Against England

snippet: Bangladesh captain Mushfiqur Rahim won the toss and opted to bat in the second and final test against England at the Shere Bangla National Stadium on Friday....
